thread.title: Shaquille O'Neal is the latest athlete to make Simone Biles look really small
thread.title_full: Shaquille O'Neal is the latest athlete to make Simone Biles look really small

author: Jordan Greer (jgreer@sportingnews.com)
title: Shaquille O'Neal is the latest athlete to make Simone Biles look really small

organizations.name: centers for disease control and prevention

text:
February 5, 2017 5:49pm EST February 5, 2017 5:49pm EST To be fair to Simone Biles, Shaquille O'Neal makes everyone look small. Simone Biles (Getty Images) 
Updated at 5:49 p.m. ET 
Updated at 5:49 p.m. ET 
Simone BilesÂ stands at 4-8, 105 pounds, much smaller than the national average of 5-3, 166 pounds for American women 20 years and older, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention .Â It's fair to say sheÂ is a tiny ball of gymnastic energy. 
So what ifÂ the Olympic gold medalist happened to stand next to someone like, oh, I don't know, 7-1 Shaquille O'Neal? That would just look ridiculous. 
Yes, that happened. And yes, it does look ridiculous. hey shaq đđž pic.twitter.com/YCrSufiyk7 â Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) February 5, 2017 
Biles and ShaqÂ crossed paths while attending Super Bowl festivities prior to the big game between the Patriots and Falcons. Note that Biles is wearing heels in that photo. To be fair, Shaq makes all humans look small. 
This is only the latest in a long line of photos showing Biles next to significantly taller athletes. Here's Biles next to 6-8 LeBron James. â Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) December 11, 2016 
Here's BilesÂ standing at a different altitude than 7-0 Dirk Nowitzki. good luck to the Mavs this season! thanks for letting us stop by practice :) pic.twitter.com/SsCYUiNalD â Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) October 1, 2016 
Here's Biles back-to-back with 6-9Â Magic Johnson. yesterday's interview w/ @MagicJohnson đâşď¸ pic.twitter.com/6Bey0xwePJ â Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) November 29, 2016 
Here's BilesÂ with fellow Olympic gold medalists Nathan Adrian (6-6)Â and Michael Phelps (6-4). Congrats to @Nathangadrian & @MichaelPhelps on the 4x100 meter GOLD! pic.twitter.com/iPjVehDDFA â Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) August 8, 2016 
And finally, here's BilesÂ with Team USA volleyball player David Lee (6-8). size difference in olympians doesn't matter, depending on what sport you do đ 6'8" & 4'8" pic.twitter.com/xiU9zIBXJH â Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) August 2, 2016 
If you don't understand what I'm saying, here's the basic message: Simone Biles is small. Watch This
